ovdesc.p: This is a live file to capture the alternate security details along with trade currency and trade exchange.
The ID of the Table will be �ISIN� .�Trade Currency� . �Stock Exchange�

desc.p: International security identification number
This field will have the ISIN code of the Security
Alphabetical characters
Trade currency as in the ID
Valid Currency in Currency Table
The TRADE EXCHANGE is from SM, If there are multiple exchanges, the exchange will be the one associated with the trade currency
Valid Stock Exchange in STOCK.EXCHANGE table
It stores the MIC of the above TRADE EXCHANGE field
4 Alphabetical characters
Standard T24 reserved field.
The ID of the Security Master for which the details are being updated here
It will be associated multi-value fields
The security currency of the associated Security Master
It will be associated multi-value fields
Stock exchange from the SM
It will be associated multi-value fields
It stores the MIC of the above STOCK EXCHANGE field
It will be associated multi-value fields
4 Alphabetical characters
Standard T24 reserved field.
It will be associated multi-value fields
Security status updated from SM
It will be associated multi-value fields
Status date updated from SM
It will be associated multi-value fields
Updated from Scrip field of SM
Updated based on Sec.Expired field from SM
It will be associated multi-value fields
Blocking date from SM
It will be associated multi-value fields
Maturity date from SM
It will be associated multi-value fields
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
